109 #define slist_next(slist,node) \
110  (((slist_node_t*)(node))->next)

134 #define slist_init(slist) \
135  do{slist_next(slist,slist) = (slist);}while(0)

166 #define slist_begin(slist) ((slist)->next)

257 #define slist_foreach(slist,iterator) \
258  for(iterator = (void*)slist_begin(slist); \
259  ((slist_node_t*)iterator) != slist_end(slist); \
260  iterator=(void*)slist_next(slist,iterator))

321 #define slist_push_front(slist,node_to_add) \
322  do{ \
323  ((slist_node_t*)(node_to_add))->next = (slist)->next; \
324  (slist)->next=((slist_node_t*)(node_to_add)); \
325  }while(0);

355 #define slist_pop_front(slist) \
356  do{(slist)->next = (slist)->next->next;}while(0)

386 #define slist_push_back(slist,node_to_add) \
387  do { \
388  ((slist_node_t*)(node_to_add))->next = slist_back(slist); \
389  ((slist_node_t*)(node_to_add))->next->next = ((slist_node_t*)(node_to_add)); \
390  ((slist_node_t*)(node_to_add))->next = slist_end(slist);\
391  }while(0)

425 #define slist_insert_after(slistptr,posptr,nodeptr) \
426  do{ \
427  ((slist_node_t*)(nodeptr))->next = ((slist_node_t*)(posptr))->next; \
428  ((slist_node_t*)(posptr))->next = ((slist_node_t*)(nodeptr)); \
429  }while(0)

462 #define slist_insert_before(slist,posptr,nodeptr) \
463  do{ \
464  slist_prev(slist,posptr)->next = (slist_node_t*)(nodeptr); \
465  ((slist_node_t*)nodeptr))->next = posptr; \
466  }while(0)

531 #define slist_erase(slistptr,nodeptr) \
532  do{ \
533  slist_prev(slistptr,nodeptr)->next = ((slist_node_t*)(nodeptr))->next; \
534  }while(0)
